text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes @washingtonpost "The chaotic culture of the Trump WH contributed to the crisis. A lack of planning and a failure to execute, combined with the president’s focus on the news cycle and his preference for following his gut rather than the data cost time, and perhaps lives."
https://t.co/EIqV8R6C3t
